name: Digimon Apocalypse (pridecem)
description:
Digimon Apocalypse game is back with innovations.
Bugs fixed. Maps have been added. The challenging adventure awaits you. Everything is in your hands in this game where six seasons are together.
Each digivice has its own characteristics.

Digivice: Has the Purge Light skill. Digimon max. Evolves to champion level.
D-3: Armor evolution, jogress evolution and digimon max. Evolves to champion level.
D-Arc: Works with cards. It has the skill of heal.
D-Tector: Converts only digidestined to digimon.
Data Link: Digimon max. evolves down to the burst mode level.
X-Loader: Fusions the digimon datas and main digimon. Evolves Shoutmon. Digimemories activates.

If you are using Digivice or D-3, you can reach the ultimate and mega level with Crest.
